original_text: But as soon as I screamed for help, he left his cloak beside me and ran out of the house.”
korean_text: 내가 소리 질러 불렀더니 그가 그의 옷을 내게 버려두고 밖으로 도망하여 나갔나이다

sentences.original_text: But as soon as I screamed for help
he left his cloak beside me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 겉옷을 내 곁에 두고

sentences.original_text: and ran out of the house.
